enableMenu.desc: Enables commands to be used when selecting a list in edit mode

onlyFrontmatter.desc: The button will only displayed if {{- sml_sort}} is on {{- value}}.
onlyFrontmatter.title: Enable only the auto sort on frontmatter properties

enableMenu.title: Editor menu

descending.desc: Reverse the order of the sort (Z-A)

settings.description: The frontmatter allows to use automatically the right commands based on the value of the following properties.

disable.desc: Disables the "automatic" command (other commands can still be used)

glossary.desc: Creates a "glossary" by group per initial letter. By default, list's elements will be sorted by ascending order, unless sml_glossary_reverse is used.
glossary.title: Glossary

items.desc: Sorts items in descending order when the glossary is used.

level.desc: Heading level for the glossary sort (1-6)
